H0.text: In1918 women over what age were given the right to vote. 21

H1.text: In1918 women over what age were given the right to vote. 25

H2.text: In1918 women over what age were given the right to vote. 28

H3.text: In1918 women over what age were given the right to vote. 30

A4.text: The Representation of the People Act 1918 widened suffrage by abolishing practically all property qualifications for men and by enfranchising women over 30 who met minimum property qualifications.

A5.text: The 1928 act gave the vote to all women aged over 21, regardless of any property qualification.
